name: statusline-advanced
description: Kompaktowa linia statusu 4x3 z parowaniem SESJA/TOTAL i per-user cross-device stats. Node.js (5-7x szybszy niz PS1)
author: kmylpenter
notes: v6.0: Przepisanie na Node.js - eliminuje PowerShell cold start (~1500ms -> ~250ms). BOM-safe JSON parsing. PS1 zachowany jako fallback. v5.6: Performance audit - regex pre-filter, atomic writes, dirty-checking. v5.5: Incremental parsing. v5.4: User name from config.
